item.description: BL-10 west at I-10 east to Deming.

item.title: Rest Area Access Road at BL-10
item.description: New Mexico Rest Area access road at BL-10. Turn right for I-10 East to Deming. Turn left for BL-10 east into Lordsburg.

item.title: BL-10 West at I-10
item.description: BL-10 west at I-10 West. Head over the overpass for I-10 east.

item.title: BL-10 West Approaching I-10
item.description: BL-10 west approaching I-10. Use I-10 west for Tucson. Use I-10 east for Deming.

item.title: NM-494 North at US-70/BL-10/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north at US-70/BL-10/NM-90. US-70/NM-90 split off BL-10 here towards Silver City.

item.description: NM-494 north approaching BL-10 and US-70.

item.title: I-10 East at Exit 22 Offramp
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22 offramp at NM-494 junction. Use NM-494 north for BL-10/US-70/NM-90.
